LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.label: acidic smog
LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->waiting for the acidic smog to clear
LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] hides near a [TerrainFeature], gazing out with a [AdjectiveAngsty] look.
LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] looks on with a cloth wrapped around [PAWN_possessive] face.

LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] suffocating [Animal]s lay on the ground.
